results.title: Myocarditis in Cats with Feline Infectious Peritonitis Can Be Cured with GS-441524 and Symptomatic Cardiovascular Treatment.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Feline_Infectious_Peritonitis @DISEASE_MESH:D016766 @@@FIP@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Myocarditis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009205 @@@myocarditis@@@ can be cured with @CHEMICAL_GS_441524 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C000710751 @@@GS-441524@@@ in combination with symptomatic cardiovascular treatment including @CHEMICAL_pimobendan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C041648 @@@pimobendan@@@, @CHEMICAL_Clopidogrel @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077144 @@@clopidogrel@@@, @CHEMICAL_Furosemide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005665 @@@furosemide@@@, or @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, depending on the clinical presentation.

citations.NLM: Buchta K, Friederich J, Zuzzi-Krebitz AM, Schöbel J, Eberhard J, Zwicklbauer K, Spiri AM, Hofmann-Lehmann R, Hartmann K, Wess G. Myocarditis in Cats with Feline Infectious Peritonitis Can Be Cured with GS-441524 and Symptomatic Cardiovascular Treatment. Animals (Basel). 2025 Jun 4;15(11):. PMID: 40509126
citations.BibTeX: @article{40509126, title={Myocarditis in Cats with Feline Infectious Peritonitis Can Be Cured with GS-441524 and Symptomatic Cardiovascular Treatment.}, author={Buchta K and Friederich J and Zuzzi-Krebitz AM and Schöbel J and Eberhard J and Zwicklbauer K and Spiri AM and Hofmann-Lehmann R and Hartmann K and Wess G}, journal={Animals (Basel)}, volume={15}, number={11}}
